## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass: `cargo test --workspace`
- [ ] Lints pass: `cargo clippy --workspace -D warnings`
- [ ] Formatted: `cargo fmt --all`
- [ ] Docs updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Conventional Commit title (e.g., `feat(cpu-core): ...`)
